title: Pixel 3a xl won't turn on
content:
My Google pixel 3a xl, has no damage. It has not been dropped, no water damage nothing.
After one of the updates, it started my sometimes I couldn't get it on. Like I might be using it n then set it down n when. I pick it back up again can't get the screen on. I can hear all my notifications still but nothing happens on the screen. Including when I charge it. 
Now, I can't use my phone at all
 I have resorted to an old phone and cannot get my 3a xl on at all. 
When I hold the power and volume down button, the screen stays black n then very very light I almost can't see it writing comes up at the bottom of my screen saying .. 
Ok there's a red triangle with exclamation point
Then says product version
Bootloader version
Baseband version
Serial number
Secure boot
Nos production
Dram
Emmmc
Device state
Boot slot
Enter reason
Above all that by the power button on the right there is a small tall white rectangle with A black arrow and in front of it I can change it from saying
Start
Power off
Barcode
Rescue mode
Recovery mode
Restart bootloader
Other than this screen.... I can not get my screen to do anything else. Completely non responsive
Except SOMETIMES when trying to restart by just holding power button, the screen lightly flashes white you almost don't see it
Please help
